title: 3 Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: Three-bedroom apartment located in a home on the 2nd & 3rd floor of a three-family home.
Ten minutes from Forest Hills, Ashmont Station, and Mattapan Station!
Street or driveway parking is available.
Will be delivered with a Newly renovated Bathroom
2 bedrooms one of the bedrooms has two closets
1 smaller bedroom w/ a large walk-in closet.
The unit contains stainless steel appliances such as a fridge, stove, microwave, and dishwasher
The unit will be delivered with freshly painted walls and refinished hardwood floors
Pets under 28 pounds will be considered.
First month $2,875 and a Security of $1,400 are required to move in.
Showing available the first week of August
